review: I had been to the hospital and it was for child planning. *** ****** *** ***** Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. After 3 months she told me to come back. I am unable to go. She told us we can do a medical test after 3 months. Because of COVID I am unable to go. The doctor gave test to do for my husband and myself. I'm satisfied with the treatment given. I have already recommended doctor to my colleague or friends. Waiting time was for 30 minutes even after being on time. The doctor was friendly and not money minded, she told don't waste money initially on tests and follow steps given.

I had health issue so went to hospital. Doctor was good. I can definitely recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I visited for gynecological related issue. There was no waiting time in the hospital, it was hardly for 5 minutes. I am fine now. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Hospitality was good.

We had consulted the doctor and it was for scanning for my wife, it was pregnancy related. *** ****** *** ***** Medicine was not prescribed by the doctor. We took scanning at that time. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was normal. Walking was suggested and she told my wife to take rest.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor was good at the scan. She is detailed and friendly and attends to your queries as well.
But the hospital does not follow the appointment time. They called saying all slots are full. You will be considered walk-in and you will have waiting. So administration wise they must look into the process of booking via practo.
Good experience of the hospital and it made us feel great feel of paternity. A hospital one can look forward for anytime!
